title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft, chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips, perfect with a glass of milk.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Colorful mix of fresh vegetables quickly cooked in a wok with savory sauces.

title: Beef Burgers
summary: Juicy grilled beef patties with lettuce, tomato, and special sauce in a soft bun.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
